modName: the GreyBeard WAY of the Spiritual DOVAHKIIN Warrior
summary: ...a Meta-Physical QUEST that will TRANSFORM the way you play SKYRIM...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430071774.png[/img]



[color=#f1c232][size=3]Hey SKYRIM Fam[/size][/color] [img]http://www.freesmileys.org/smileys/smiley-hug006.gif[/img]


...for our fellow HARD-CORE RolePlaying SKYRIM'ers, allow us to introduce you to...


"[color=#f1c232][size=3]the GreyBeard WAY of the Spiritual DOVAHKIIN Warrior[/size][/color]"


In these brutally troubling times in SKYRIM's Land of TAMRIEL, YOU have nonetheless selflessly chosen the [size=3]PATH of Peace & Love[/size] - on your way to becoming [size=3]ONE with PAARTHURNAX[/size]

the GreyBeards have been watching-over you & have become supremely in AWE of your utterly BRAVE choice: HOW CAN ONE SUCCESSFULLY FOLLOW SUCH A SPIRITUAL PATH WHEN ONE's QUESTS ARE RIFE WITH BRUTAL COMBAT-BATTLE???


enter... [color=#f1c232]the GreyBeard WAY of the Spiritual DOVAHKIIN Warrior[/color]


YES, in their High-Esteem of YOU, the GreyBeard's wish to AID you on your JOURNEY by sharing with you their [size=3]MOST POWERFUL & ESOTERIC SECRETS of COMPASSIONATE Self-Defense/Self-Preservation thru their ANCIENT & UNIQUE SPELLS & POWERS[/size]


YOUR Journey begins at the SOLITUDE TEMPLE Of The DIVINES, where you will find a VERY DETAILED/STEP-BY-STEP SEALED LETTER from the GreyBeards at the Foot of KYNARETH's Shrine


the GreyBeard WAY of the Spiritual DOVAHKIIN Warrior has 3 INITIATION LEVELS:

[color=#f1c232][size=3]GBWSDW [INITIATE Level-I: THE SPELLS][/size][/color] - now available in the DL Files-Section

[i][b][Learn, Practice, & Utilize THE SPELLS Faithfully as you go-about your SKYRIM QUESTS - this will prepare you for INITIATE Level-II][/b][/i]

[color=#f1c232][size=3]GBWSDW [INITIATE Level-II: THE POWERS][/size][/color] - COMING SOON (will be available here in 'bout a week)

[i][b][Learn, Practice, & Utilize THE POWERS Faithfully as you go-about your SKYRIM QUESTS, BUT you will now have to pass the ULTIMATE TEST of the TRUE Spiritual Warrior - IF you Succeed AND Survive, you will then be prepared for INITIATE Level-III][/b][/i]

[color=#f1c232][size=3]GBWSDW [INITIATE Level-III: THE ASCENSION][/size][/color] - COMING SOON (will be available here in 'bout 2 weeks)

[i][b][NOW that YOU have BECOME the ULTIMATE POWERFUL Spiritual Warrior, will you RISK your OWN LIFE to RESCUE a Good-People of TAMRIEL from the DEPTHS of a HORRIFIC DOOM - if you indeed choose to do so, and again IF you Succeed AND Survive - YOU will be GLORIOUSLY REWARDED with an ULTIMATE DIVINE POWER that will both SMITE all your enemies/attackers with a DEBILITATING FEAR of you as well as INSPIRE all Good-People of TAMRIEL to LOVE, SUPPORT, & CHERISH you... YOU have CONQUERED the World of SKYRIM & must now LEAD the GreyBeards alongside PAARTHURNAX][/b][/i]


we bid you [size=3]PEACE, LOVE, & SUCCESS[/size] our kindred [size=3]SPIRITUAL DOVAHKIIN WARRIORS[/size] for your Journey will indeed be one of [size=3]MAGIC, PERILOUS DANGER, & ASCENSION[/size] [size=2](as well as some of the friggin' COOLEST Spells & Powers, with AWESOME EYE-CANDY VISUALS - LOL)[/size]


[color=#f1c232][size=3][i]alex & taina[/i][/size][/color]
 [i][size=3][img]http://www.freesmileys.org/smileys/smiley-hug006.gif[/img][/size][/i]
author: Alex y Taina

files.name: GBWSDW (INITIATE Level-I) DO NOT DL THIS FILE
